import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { CBadge, CDropdown, CDropdownItem, CDropdownMenu, CDropdownToggle, CImg } from '@coreui/react' import CIcon from '@coreui/icons-react'; import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify'; import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; import ChatBox from 'src/views/ChatBox/ChatBox'; const TheHeaderDropdownMssg = ({socket,state}) => { const notify = (data) => toast(data); const [open,setOpen]=useState(false); const [email,setEmail] = useState(''); const [taskid,setTaskid] =useState(''); const Open=(mail,taskid)=>{ setTaskid(taskid); setEmail(mail); setOpen(!open); } if(state){ socket.on('newMessage',(message)=>{ //console.log(message); notify('you have a new message from '+message.username+"..."+message.message.substring(0, 100)); //alert(test) }) } const itemsCount = 4 return ( {itemsCount} You have {itemsCount} messages
